products.title: Splash Dark Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful contemporary. The dark grey roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring acorn pull which removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. The splash dark grey roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

products.title: Splash Flamingo Pink Roller Blind
products.description: Splash flamingo pink is a beautiful bright pink shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash flamingo pink roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.
